title: Low FPS issue ever since 7.6
body:
Hey Everyone,

I've been asking around to see what solutions there could be but no answer has come up yet. I'm hoping someone can help with this issue.

My FPS is around 7-16 when in a fight and 20+ when just roaming. I've even lowered my quality to low and this still occurs. It is constant throughout all games.

My specs are:
i7 processor 2.70GHz
AMD Radeon R5 M430

replies.body:
A few things could be causing the FPS drops such as your video driver, or your graphics card! Not saying that's the case, but  to rule them out I would suggest running through these steps in our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684). If you still have issues afterwords make sure to let me know and i'll look for an alternative fix for you! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
